General.Name: Nano Labs Ltd
General.Description: Nano Labs Ltd operates as a fabless integrated circuit design company and product solution provider in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company develops computing chips. It also offers distributed computing and storage solutions, smart network interface cards, and vision computing chips, as well as distributed rendering technology. In addition, the company engages in the research and development of software. The company's customers include enterprises and individual buyers. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: China Yuangu Hanggang Tech Bldg, Hangzhou, China, 310000
